SCTX:
Begin ColonyGraring

short nolore
short doonce
short target
short OnPCHitMe

if ( doonce == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_8" == 10 )
		if ( GetDisabled "Coventina Celata" == 0 )
			StartCombat "Coventina Celata"
			set doonce to 1
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( GetHealth < 1 )
	if ( GetTarget "Coventina Celata" == 1 )
		set target to 1
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_8" >= 10 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_8" < 50 )
		if ( OnDeath == 1 )
			if ( target == 1 )
				Journal CO_8 100
			else
				Journal CO_8 150
			endif	
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( OnPCHitMe == 1 )
	"Hidar"->SetFight 100
	"Hidar"->StartCombat Player
	"Aenar"->SetFight 100
	"Aenar"->StartCombat Player
endif

End ColonyGraring
